data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Nord-Est a passion to plant another simple church.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nord-Est, Haiti
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who are far from you in Nord-Est. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.section_summary: On average, 63 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Nord-Est, Haiti.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, grace the churches in Nord-Est, Haiti with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 52,674 believers in the state of Nord-Est.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, help the 52,674 believers in Nord-Est to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 247,826 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, it’s possible most of the 15,494 lost people in  Nord-Est, Haiti have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Nord-Est, Haiti by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Nord-Est
location.cities_list: Dajabón, Fort Liberté, Trou du Nord, Ouanaminthe, Pepillo Salcedo
location.cities_list_w_pop: Dajabón (16,398), Fort Liberté (11,465), Trou du Nord (10,569), Ouanaminthe (10,118), Pepillo Salcedo (3,866)
